Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Spawns a GameObject using the ID from the Object ID field in Object Parameters.", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:Show() end)

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Moves you (or the selected object, if you have Move Object enabled in Options) backwards by the amount specified in the Length field in Object Parameters.", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:Show() end)

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Moves you (or the selected object, if you have Move Object enabled in Options) forwards by the amount specified in the Length field in Object Parameters.", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:Show() end)

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Moves you (or the selected object, if you have Move Object enabled in Options) left by the amount specified in the Width field in Object Parameters.", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:Show() end)

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Moves you (or the selected object, if you have Move Object enabled in Options) up by the amount specified in the Height field in Object Parameters.", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:Show() end)

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Teleports you to the selected GameObject.", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:Show() end)

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Moves you (or the selected object, if you have Move Object enabled in Options) right by the amount specified in the Width field in Object Parameters.", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:Show() end)

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Moves you (or the selected object, if you have Move Object enabled in Options) down by the amount specified in the Height field in Object Parameters.", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:Show() end)

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Set the Object ID you wish to spawn (From 'Spawn' button, Spawn on Move, or Hotkey).", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:Show() end)
Scripts.OnTextChanged: if self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+%.%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%.%d+") then self:SetTextColor(255,255,255,1) OPMasterTable.Options["ObjectID"] = self:GetText() elseif self:GetText() == "" then self:SetTextColor(255,255,255,1) elseif self:GetText():find("%a") then self:SetText(self:GetText():gsub("%a", "")) else self:SetTextColor(1,0,0,1) end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Set the number to be used for Forward and Backwards Movements.\r\n", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:AddLine("May be affected by 'Scale', and the 'Double' or 'Halve' options.",1,1,1,true) GameTooltip:Show() end)
Scripts.OnTextChanged: if self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+%.%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%.%d+") then self:SetTextColor(255,255,255,1) OPMasterTable.Options["Length"] = self:GetText() elseif self:GetText() == "" then self:SetTextColor(255,255,255,1) elseif self:GetText():find("%a") then self:SetText(self:GetText():gsub("%a", "")) else self:SetTextColor(1,0,0,1) end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Set the number to be used for Left and Right Movements.\r\n", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:AddLine("May be affected by 'Scale', and the 'Double' or 'Halve' options.",1,1,1,true) GameTooltip:Show() end)
Scripts.OnTextChanged: if self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+%.%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%.%d+") then self:SetTextColor(255,255,255,1) OPMasterTable.Options["Width"] = self:GetText() elseif self:GetText() == "" then self:SetTextColor(255,255,255,1) elseif self:GetText():find("%a") then self:SetText(self:GetText():gsub("%a", "")) else self:SetTextColor(1,0,0,1) end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Set the number to be used for Up and Down Movements.\r\n", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:AddLine("May be affected by 'Scale', and the 'Double' or 'Halve' options.",1,1,1,true) GameTooltip:Show() end)
Scripts.OnTextChanged: if self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+%.%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%.%d+") then self:SetTextColor(255,255,255,1) OPMasterTable.Options["Height"] = self:GetText() elseif self:GetText() == "" then self:SetTextColor(255,255,255,1) elseif self:GetText():find("%a") then self:SetText(self:GetText():gsub("%a", "")) else self:SetTextColor(1,0,0,1) end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Set the number to scale the object to when spawned by ObjectMover.\r\n", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:AddLine("Also modifies the Length, Width, and Height parameters by multiplying them by the scale (checkbox must be enabled for this to do anything).",1,1,1,true) GameTooltip:Show() end)
Scripts.OnTextChanged: if self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+%.%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%.%d+") then ScaleObject:Enable() self:SetTextColor(255,255,255,1) OPMasterTable.Options["Scale"] = self:GetText() elseif self:GetText() == "" then self:SetTextColor(255,255,255,1) ScaleObject:Disable() elseif self:GetText():find("%a") then self:SetText(self:GetText():gsub("%a", "")) else self:SetTextColor(1,0,0,1) ScaleObject:Disable() end

Scripts.OnEnter:
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Enable Scale Option
", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:AddLine("All dimensions (Length, Width, Height) will be multiplied by the defined scale, and objects spawned by ObjectMover will be automatically set to that scale.
",1,1,1,true) GameTooltip:AddLine("May stack with 'Double' and 'Halve' modifiers.
",1,1,1,true) GameTooltip:AddLine("If disabled, Scale will have no effect anywhere.",1,1,1,true) GameTooltip:Show() end)
Scripts.OnClick: if self:GetChecked() == true then OPMasterTable.Options["ScaleTog"] = true else OPMasterTable.Options["ScaleTog"] = false end
Scripts.OnShow: if OPMasterTable.Options["ScaleTog"] == true then self:SetChecked(true) end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Sets the Object ID to the currently selected Object.\r\n", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:AddLine("Right Click to Grab Selected Object ID & auto-set the detected dimensions (m2 only).",1,1,1,true) GameTooltip:Show() end)

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Doubles the current Length value by changing the actual box value.", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:Show() end)
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Halves the current Length value.", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:Show() end)

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Doubles the current Width value by changing the actual box value.", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:Show() end)
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Halves the current Width value.", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:Show() end)

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Doubles the current Height value by changing the actual box value.", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:Show() end)
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Halves the current Height value.", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:Show() end)

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Doubles the current Height value by changing the actual box value.", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:Show() end)
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Halves the current Height value.", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:Show() end)

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Opens up a new dialogue to save the current Object Parameters (ID, Length, Width, Height, and Scale) for quickly loading later.\r\n", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:AddLine("Leaving an option blank, or as '0', will cause it to not load (i.e., leaving the ObjectID blank will cause it to not change your current ObjectID when loaded).",1,1,1,true) GameTooltip:Show() end)

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Spawn an Object at your location every time you move.\r\n", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:AddLine("Disabled when using Move Object mode.",1,1,1,true) GameTooltip:Show() end)
Scripts.OnClick: if self:GetChecked() == true then OPMasterTable.Options["SpawnOnMove"] = true else OPMasterTable.Options["SpawnOnMove"] = false end
Scripts.OnShow: if OPMasterTable.Options["SpawnOnMove"] == true then self:SetChecked(true) end if OPMoveObjectInstead:GetChecked() then self:Disable() else self:Enable() end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Only uses half the value supplied in Length, Width, and Height, when moving.", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:Show() end)
Scripts.OnMouseUp: if OPBifoldToggle:GetChecked() == true then OPBifoldToggle:SetChecked(false) end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Uses double the value supplied in Length, Width, and Height, when moving.", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:Show() end)
Scripts.OnMouseUp: if OPHalveToggle:GetChecked() == true then OPHalveToggle:SetChecked(false) end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Moves your selected object instead of yourself.", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:Show() end)
Scripts.OnClick: if self:GetChecked() == true then OPMasterTable.Options["MoveObject"] = true RelativeToPlayerToggle:Enable() SpawnonMoveButton:Disable() else OPMasterTable.Options["MoveObject"] = false RelativeToPlayerToggle:Disable() SpawnonMoveButton:Enable() end
Scripts.OnShow: if OPMasterTable.Options["MoveObject"] == true then self:SetChecked(true) end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Moves the Object relative to the direction you are facing instead of where the object is facing.\r\n", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:AddLine("Example: If the object is facing East, but you are facing North, moving forward will move the object North, not East.\r\n",1,1,1,true) GameTooltip:AddLine("Only works with 'Move Object' enabled.",1,1,1,true) GameTooltip:Show() end)
Scripts.OnClick: if self:GetChecked() == true then OPMasterTable.Options["RelativeToPlayer"] = true else OPMasterTable.Options["RelativeToPlayer"] = false end
Scripts.OnShow: if OPMasterTable.Options["RelativeToPlayer"] == true then self:SetChecked(true) end if OPMoveObjectInstead:GetChecked() then self:Enable() else self:Disable() end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Toggles filtering of server reply messages for 'object rotated', 'object moved', ect.", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:Show() end)

Scripts.OnMouseDown: if self.dragEndTimer then self.dragEndTimer:Cancel() end self.sliderDragChange = true self.isDragging = true OPTintDragging = true
Scripts.OnMouseUp: self.isDragging = false self.dragEndTimer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.2,function() if not self.isMousedOver then self.sliderDragChange = false end OPTintDragging = false end)
Scripts.OnEnter: self.sliderDragChange = true self.isMousedOver = true GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Drag to change current Red Tint on an Object", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:Show() end)
Scripts.OnLeave: self.isMousedOver = false if not self.isDragging then self.sliderDragChange = false end GameTooltip_Hide() self.Timer:Cancel()

Scripts.OnMouseDown: if self.dragEndTimer then self.dragEndTimer:Cancel() end self.sliderDragChange = true self.isDragging = true OPTintDragging = true
Scripts.OnMouseUp: self.isDragging = false self.dragEndTimer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.2,function() if not self.isMousedOver then self.sliderDragChange = false end OPTintDragging = false end)
Scripts.OnEnter: self.sliderDragChange = true self.isMousedOver = true GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Drag to change current Green Tint on an Object", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:Show() end)
Scripts.OnLeave: self.isMousedOver = false if not self.isDragging then self.sliderDragChange = false end GameTooltip_Hide() self.Timer:Cancel()

Scripts.OnMouseDown: if self.dragEndTimer then self.dragEndTimer:Cancel() end self.sliderDragChange = true self.isDragging = true OPTintDragging = true
Scripts.OnMouseUp: self.isDragging = false self.dragEndTimer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.2,function() if not self.isMousedOver then self.sliderDragChange = false end OPTintDragging = false end)
Scripts.OnEnter: self.sliderDragChange = true self.isMousedOver = true GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Drag to change current Blue Tint on an Object", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:Show() end)
Scripts.OnLeave: self.isMousedOver = false if not self.isDragging then self.sliderDragChange = false end GameTooltip_Hide() self.Timer:Cancel()

Scripts.OnMouseDown: if self.dragEndTimer then self.dragEndTimer:Cancel() end self.sliderDragChange = true self.isDragging = true OPTintDragging = true
Scripts.OnMouseUp: self.isDragging = false self.dragEndTimer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.2,function() if not self.isMousedOver then self.sliderDragChange = false end OPTintDragging = false end)
Scripts.OnEnter: self.sliderDragChange = true self.isMousedOver = true GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Drag to change current Transparency on an Object", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:Show() end)
Scripts.OnLeave: self.isMousedOver = false if not self.isDragging then self.sliderDragChange = false end GameTooltip_Hide() self.Timer:Cancel()

Scripts.OnClick:
r, g, b, a = OPTintSliderR:GetValue()/100,OPTintSliderG:GetValue()/100,OPTintSliderB:GetValue()/100,OPTintSliderT:GetValue()/100 ColorPickerFrame:SetColorRGB(r, g, b) ColorPickerFrame.hasOpacity, ColorPickerFrame.opacity = true, a ColorPickerFrame.previousValues = {r,g,b,a}; ColorPickerFrame.func, ColorPickerFrame.cancelFunc = OPUpdateTints, OPUpdateTints
ColorPickerFrame.opacityFunc = (function() OPTintSliderT:SetValue(OpacitySliderFrame:GetValue()*100) end) ColorPickerOkayButton:HookScript("OnClick", OPUpdateTintsApply) OPTintIsControllingColorPicker = true ColorPickerFrame:Hide() ColorPickerFrame:Show()
Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Open the Color Wheel to Select a Color.", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:Show() end)

Scripts.OnClick: if not down then if button == "LeftButton" then OPTintObject(); elseif button == "RightButton" then OPResetTint(true); end end
Scripts.OnMouseDown: if button == "LeftButton" then self:SetText(APPLY) elseif button == "RightButton" then self:SetText(REMOVE) end
Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Applies the current Tint Settings to the selected object.\r\n", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:AddLine("Right Click to Reset/Remove the objects tint.",1,1,1,true) GameTooltip:Show() end)

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Opens a Dialogue Box to Apply a Spell to the Selected Object.\r\n", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:AddLine("Right Click to Remove the Current Spell.",1,1,1,true) GameTooltip:Show() end)

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Automatically Updates the Tint Sliders & Spell to the Selected Object", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:Show() end)
Scripts.OnClick: if self:GetChecked() == true then OPMasterTable.Options["autoUpdateTint"] = true --self:SetChecked(false) else OPMasterTable.Options["autoUpdateTint"] = false --self:SetChecked(true) end

Scripts.OnTextChanged: if self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+%.%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%.%d+") then self:SetTextColor(255,255,255,1) elseif self:GetText() == "" then self:SetTextColor(255,255,255,1) elseif self:GetText():find("%a") then self:SetText(self:GetText():gsub("%a", "")) else self:SetTextColor(1,0,0,1) end
Scripts.OnEditFocusLost: if self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+%.%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%.%d+") then local OPRotXEditVal = self:GetText() OPRotationSliderX:SetValueStep(0.0001) OPRotationSliderX:SetValue(OPRotXEditVal,true) OPClearRotateChatFilter() end
Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Set the value to Roll (Rotate / Tilt Sideways) the selected GameObject to.\r\n", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:AddLine("Objects will be set to the current Roll, Pitch, and Turn values all together.\r\n",1,1,1,true) GameTooltip:AddLine("Typed in numbers will automatically round to 4 decimal places.",1,1,1,true) GameTooltip:Show() end)

Scripts.OnMouseDown: OPIMFUCKINGROTATINGDONTSPAMME = true if self.dragEndTimer then self.dragEndTimer:Cancel() end self.sliderDragChange = true self.isDragging = true
Scripts.OnMouseUp: OPClearRotateChatFilter() self.isDragging = false self.dragEndTimer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.2,function() if not self.isMousedOver then self.sliderDragChange = false if OPMasterTable.Options["debug"] then print("OPDEBUG: dragEndTimer disabled sliderDragChange. Rounding Disabled.") end end end)
Scripts.OnValueChanged: if OPFramesAreLoaded then local OPRotSliderValX = self:GetValue() if userInput then if OPMasterTable.Options["debug"] then print(self.sliderDragChange) end if self.sliderDragChange then if OPMasterTable.Options["debug"] then print("Val ("..OPRotSliderValX..") Rounded to 3 decimals") end OPRotSliderValX = roundToNthDecimal(OPRotSliderValX,3) if IsShiftKeyDown() then if IsAltKeyDown() then self:SetValueStep(5) else self:SetValueStep(0.1) end elseif IsAltKeyDown() then self:SetValueStep(0.01) else self:SetValueStep(1) end else if OPMasterTable.Options["debug"] then print("Val ("..OPRotSliderValX..") Rounded to 4 decimals") end OPRotSliderValX = roundToNthDecimal(OPRotSliderValX,4) end OPRotationEditBoxX:SetText(OPRotSliderValX) if not dontFuckingRotate then OPRotateObject(); end end OPRotSliderValX = roundToNthDecimal(OPRotSliderValX,4) OPRotationEditBoxX:SetText(OPRotSliderValX) end
Scripts.OnEnter:
self.sliderDragChange = true self.isMousedOver = true if OPMasterTable.Options["debug"] then print("Ye' entered the drag frame, you might drag, so lets classify you as dragging for rounding filter") end GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Drag to change current Roll (Rotate / Tilt Sideways). Values less than 0 will default to 0 (-1 is for saving only).
", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:AddLine("Rotation will automatically apply (including Pitch and Turn) as it changes.
", 1, 1, 1, true) GameTooltip:AddLine("Modifiers (Hold while Dragging):
Default - whole numbers (1)
SHIFT - 1 decimal place (0.1)
ALT - 2 decimal places (0.01)",1, 1, 1, true) GameTooltip:Show() end)
Scripts.OnLeave: self.isMousedOver = false if not self.isDragging then self.sliderDragChange = false if OPMasterTable.Options["debug"] then print("sliderDragChange turned off cuz u left while not dragging.") end end GameTooltip_Hide() self.Timer:Cancel()

Scripts.OnTextChanged: if self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+%.%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%.%d+") then self:SetTextColor(255,255,255,1) elseif self:GetText() == "" then self:SetTextColor(255,255,255,1) elseif self:GetText():find("%a") then self:SetText(self:GetText():gsub("%a", "")) else self:SetTextColor(1,0,0,1) end
Scripts.OnEditFocusLost: if self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+%.%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%.%d+") then local OPRotYEditVal = self:GetText() OPRotationSliderY:SetValueStep(0.0001) OPRotationSliderY:SetValue(OPRotYEditVal,true) OPClearRotateChatFilter() end
Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Set the value to Pitch (Rotate / Tilt Forward) the selected GameObject to.\r\n", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:AddLine("Objects will be set to the current Roll, Pitch, and Turn values all together.\r\n",1,1,1,true) GameTooltip:AddLine("Typed in numbers will automatically round to 4 decimal places.",1,1,1,true) GameTooltip:Show() end)

Scripts.OnMouseDown: OPIMFUCKINGROTATINGDONTSPAMME = true if self.dragEndTimer then self.dragEndTimer:Cancel() end self.sliderDragChange = true self.isDragging = true
Scripts.OnMouseUp: OPClearRotateChatFilter() self.isDragging = false self.dragEndTimer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.2,function() if not self.isMousedOver then self.sliderDragChange = false if OPMasterTable.Options["debug"] then print("OPDEBUG: dragEndTimer disabled sliderDragChange. Rounding Disabled.") end end end)
Scripts.OnValueChanged: if OPFramesAreLoaded then local OPRotSliderValY = self:GetValue() if userInput then if OPMasterTable.Options["debug"] then print(self.sliderDragChange) end if self.sliderDragChange then if OPMasterTable.Options["debug"] then print("Val ("..OPRotSliderValY..") Rounded to 3 decimals") end OPRotSliderValY = roundToNthDecimal(OPRotSliderValY,3) if IsShiftKeyDown() then if IsAltKeyDown() then self:SetValueStep(5) else self:SetValueStep(0.1) end elseif IsAltKeyDown() then self:SetValueStep(0.01) else self:SetValueStep(1) end else if OPMasterTable.Options["debug"] then print("Val ("..OPRotSliderValY..") Rounded to 4 decimals") end OPRotSliderValY = roundToNthDecimal(OPRotSliderValY,4) end if not dontFuckingRotate then OPRotateObject(); end end OPRotSliderValY = roundToNthDecimal(OPRotSliderValY,4) OPRotationEditBoxY:SetText(OPRotSliderValY) end
Scripts.OnEnter:
self.sliderDragChange = true self.isMousedOver = true if OPMasterTable.Options["debug"] then print("Ye' entered the drag frame, you might drag, so lets classify you as dragging for rounding filter") end GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Drag to change current Pitch (Rotate / Tilt Forwards). Values less than 0 will default to 0 (-1 is for saving only).
", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:AddLine("Rotation will automatically apply (including Roll and Turn) as it changes.
", 1, 1, 1, true) GameTooltip:AddLine("Modifiers (Hold while Dragging):
Default - whole numbers (1)
SHIFT - 1 decimal place (0.1)
ALT - 2 decimal places (0.01)",1, 1, 1, true) GameTooltip:Show() end)
Scripts.OnLeave: self.isMousedOver = false if not self.isDragging then self.sliderDragChange = false if OPMasterTable.Options["debug"] then print("sliderDragChange turned off cuz u left while not dragging.") end end GameTooltip_Hide() self.Timer:Cancel()

Scripts.OnTextChanged: if self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+%.%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%.%d+") then self:SetTextColor(255,255,255,1) elseif self:GetText() == "" then self:SetTextColor(255,255,255,1) elseif self:GetText():find("%a") then self:SetText(self:GetText():gsub("%a", "")) else self:SetTextColor(1,0,0,1) end
Scripts.OnEditFocusLost: if self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%d+%.%d+") or self:GetText() == self:GetText():match("%.%d+") then local OPRotZEditVal = self:GetText() OPRotationSliderZ:SetValueStep(0.0001) OPRotationSliderZ:SetValue(OPRotZEditVal,true) OPClearRotateChatFilter() end
Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Set the value to Turn (Rotate Around / Face) the selected GameObject to.\r\n", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:AddLine("Objects will be set to the current Roll, Pitch, and Turn values all together.\r\n",1,1,1,true) GameTooltip:AddLine("Typed in numbers will automatically round to 4 decimal places.",1,1,1,true) GameTooltip:Show() end)

Scripts.OnMouseDown: OPIMFUCKINGROTATINGDONTSPAMME = true if self.dragEndTimer then self.dragEndTimer:Cancel() end self.sliderDragChange = true self.isDragging = true
Scripts.OnMouseUp: OPClearRotateChatFilter() self.isDragging = false self.dragEndTimer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.2,function() if not self.isMousedOver then self.sliderDragChange = false if OPMasterTable.Options["debug"] then print("OPDEBUG: dragEndTimer disabled sliderDragChange. Rounding Disabled.") end end end)
Scripts.OnValueChanged: if OPFramesAreLoaded then local OPRotSliderValZ = self:GetValue() if userInput then if OPMasterTable.Options["debug"] then print(self.sliderDragChange) end if self.sliderDragChange then if OPMasterTable.Options["debug"] then print("Val ("..OPRotSliderValZ..") Rounded to 3 decimals") end OPRotSliderValZ = roundToNthDecimal(OPRotSliderValZ,3) if IsShiftKeyDown() then if IsAltKeyDown() then self:SetValueStep(5) else self:SetValueStep(0.1) end elseif IsAltKeyDown() then self:SetValueStep(0.01) else self:SetValueStep(1) end else if OPMasterTable.Options["debug"] then print("Val ("..OPRotSliderValZ..") Rounded to 4 decimals") end OPRotSliderValZ = roundToNthDecimal(OPRotSliderValZ,4) end if not dontFuckingRotate then OPRotateObject(); end end OPRotSliderValZ = roundToNthDecimal(OPRotSliderValZ,4) OPRotationEditBoxZ:SetText(OPRotSliderValZ) end
Scripts.OnEnter:
self.sliderDragChange = true self.isMousedOver = true if OPMasterTable.Options["debug"] then print("Ye' entered the drag frame, you might drag, so lets classify you as dragging for rounding filter") end GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Drag to change current Turn (Rotate Around / Face). Values less than 0 will default to 0 (-1 is for saving only).
", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:AddLine("Rotation will automatically apply (including Roll and Pitch) as it changes.
", 1, 1, 1, true) GameTooltip:AddLine("Modifiers (Hold while Dragging):
Default - whole numbers (1)
SHIFT - 1 decimal place (0.1)
ALT - 2 decimal places (0.01)",1, 1, 1, true) GameTooltip:Show() end)
Scripts.OnLeave: self.isMousedOver = false if not self.isDragging then self.sliderDragChange = false if OPMasterTable.Options["debug"] then print("sliderDragChange turned off cuz u left while not dragging.") end end GameTooltip_Hide() self.Timer:Cancel()

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Applies the current Roll, Pitch, and Turn to the currently selected object.", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:Show() end)

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Opens up a new dialogue to save the current Object Rotations (Roll, Pitch, and Turn) for quickly loading later.\r\n", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:AddLine("Leaving a rotation as '-1' will cause it to not load (i.e., setting Roll to '-1' will cause it to leave Roll unchanged when loaded).",1,1,1,true) GameTooltip:Show() end)

GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Automatically Updates the Rotation Sliders to the objects current rotation when you select an object, and when you manually rotate the object via '.go rotate' or '.go pitch/roll/turn'.", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:Show() end)
Scripts.OnClick: if self:GetChecked() == true then OPMasterTable.Options["autoUpdateRot"] = true --self:SetChecked(false) else OPMasterTable.Options["autoUpdateRot"] = false --self:SetChecked(true) end

if tonumber(OPLengthBox:GetText()) == 6 and tonumber(OPWidthBox:GetText()) == 6 and tonumber(OPHeightBox:GetText()) == 6 then print("You.. Are Not Prepared!") PlaySound("11466") end HideParentPanel(self);

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") self.Timer = C_Timer.NewTimer(0.7,function() GameTooltip:SetText("Locks the UI from being moved.", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:Show() end)

Scripts.OnUpdate: local xpos, ypos = GetCursorPosition() local xmin, ymin = Minimap:GetLeft(), Minimap:GetBottom() xpos, ypos = xmin-xpos/UIParent:GetScale()+70, ypos/UIParent:GetScale()-ymin-70 MinimapPos = math.deg(math.atan2(ypos,xpos)) ObjectManipulator_MinimapButton:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", "Minimap", "TOPLEFT", 52-(80*cos(MinimapPos)), (80*sin(MinimapPos))-52)

Scripts.OnLoad:
self:RegisterForClicks("LeftButtonUp","RightButtonUp") self:RegisterForDrag("LeftButton","RightButton")
local cowbell = Test or CreateFrame("Frame", "Test", UIParent) local keyCount = 1 local function HandleKey(self, key) local keyOrder = {"UP","UP","DOWN","DOWN","LEFT","RIGHT","LEFT","RIGHT","B","A","ENTER"} if key == keyOrder[keyCount] then keyCount=keyCount+1 else keyCount = 1 end if keyCount == 12 then print("NEED MORE COWBELL!") PlaySound(47631, "MASTER") C_Timer.After(1,function() PlaySound(79392, "MASTER") end) keyCount = 1 end end cowbell:SetScript("OnKeyDown", HandleKey) cowbell:SetPropagateKeyboardInput(true)
Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_LEFT") GameTooltip:SetText("Object Mover")
